basics.name: Abhoy Chand Mondal
basics.label: Professor, Dept. of Computer Science | M.Sc., M.C.A., Ph.D.
basics.summary: Professor in the Department of Computer Science at The University of Burdwan, a position held from 1996 to the present. My research focuses on areas including Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval, and Big Data Analytics.

interests.title: Research Interests
interests.description: Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval, Sentiment Analysis, Opinion Mining, Soft Computing, Fuzzy Logic, Neural Networks, Big Data Analytics.
